bug.author: lcy-seso
bug.description: The softmax with cross entropy operator does not correctly handle the gradients it receives that it fails in gradient checks after this PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/pull/5027>#5027</denchmark-link> . related to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/issues/5101>#5101</denchmark-link>
